post_message: "This video is heart wrenching," says a Rancho Cucamonga animal-lover whose security cameras captured his dog being dragged to its death by a coyote.   Oliver, a 9-year-old dachshund, was chasing the intruder coyote away from his sister dog when the wild animal grabbed him.  "Even a 7- foot wall won't keep your pets safe," the homeowner warns.
